column14: Initial review: Best ones I’ve used.  Good quality. You only need about a half teaspoon of shower gel as this “loofah” creates a lot of bubbly soap. I’ve used two different brands and types of shower and bath gel with it. Works effectively you gently exfoliate and cleanse your skin. You need to wash it and squeeze out excess soap for about 3 full minutes under the shower head or bath faucet to eliminate all soap. This process of soap removal is important. Otherwise, soap buildup left in this product can cause bacteria. Let hang to dry also is important.
